Get to know me

A few words...

Understanding is something that is critical in every part of my life. Whether it is facilitation for my children to achieve understanding or furthering my education to empower the applications I build, everything is based in clarity and consideration. My background in Special Education has been a catalyst in my programming transition, sparking ideas for ways to innovate and develop applications that can help the world around me. Code enables me to be a lifelong learner through programs like General Assembly, Shecodes, and more.
